Episodes.Title: Cooking the Books
Episodes.Plot: Bernard?s dodgy accountant has to go on the run, leaving him ill prepared to fill out his own tax return. In fact Bernard would rather do anything than fill it out.
Episodes.GuestStars: Daisy Campbell, Dominic Carter, Jeillo Edwards, Martin Freeman, John MacNell, Eamonn O'Neill, James O'Neill, Michael Parkhouse, Muriel Pavlow, Jack Pierce, Rupert Vansittart, Tony Bluto

Episodes.Title: Manny?s First Day
Episodes.Plot: After Manny?s help with the tax return Bernard is persuaded to hire him in the shop. Unfortunately he actually sells some books, much to Bernard?s annoyance.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Decio, Graham Linehan, Rhys Thomas, John Arthur, David Cann, Ben Homewood, Stewart Wright

Episodes.Title: The Grapes of Wrath
Episodes.Plot: Bernard and Manny accept a house-sitting job to get away from their new cleaner. They also drink some wine.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Aiken, Paul Beech, Daisy Campbell, Kevin Eldon, Ben Homewood, Chris Larner

Episodes.Title: The Blackout
Episodes.Plot: A hyper, coffee fueled Manny is mistaken for a policeman.
Episodes.GuestStars: Terry Bird, Angela Curran, Evie Garratt, Liam Hess, Louise Hickson, Colin McFarlane, Wayne Morris, Elizabeth Marmur, Hugh Parker

Episodes.Title: The Big Lock-Out
Episodes.Plot: The shop gets a new security system that no-one can work.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Beech, Steve Bowditch, Nick Frost, Peter Serafinowicz, Tony Way, Graham Linehan, Dick Lunn

Episodes.Title: He's Leaving Home
Episodes.Plot: Manny runs away from the bookshop into the arms of a beard loving photographer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Omid Djalili, Sophie Stanton, David Walliams
